title: Joy Reid | Trump Obsesses Over His Cognitive Test, Deploys More Secret Police: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump sending more federal officers into cities and trying to convince people he’s taking the pandemic seriously and that his brain works.

Then, he talks to MSNBC's Joy Reid, host of the new show The ReidOut.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
